/>
X.i.6.F.1.i
.
Returning Paper Evidence
Once documents have been successfully uploaded into the eFolder, as described in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 6.F.1.h
, the MSC must follow the steps in the table below to return the original paper documents to the participant.
Step
Action
1
Compose a
Return of Documents
letter.
2
List the documents that were uploaded into the eFolder and the date they were received.
3
Enclose the original documents and provide the letter to the participant.
4
Upload a copy of the letter into the participant’s eFolder.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section F - Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES) Development and Examinations
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section F
